Package xyz.rk0cc.willpub.cmd.annotation

Annotation Interface PubPerquisitesOptions

@Documented @Retention(RUNTIME) @Target(TYPE) public @interface PubPerquisitesOptions
Annotated PubOption required either or both perquisites options are assigned already in PubSubCommand or removed automatically depending on perquisites policy.
Since:
1.0.0

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    static enum 
    PubPerquisitesOptions.PerquisitesPolicy
    Define annotated PubOption that handling on modification.

  • Required Element Summary

    Required Elements
    Modifier and Type
    Required Element
    Description
    Class<? extends PubOption>[]
    perquisites
    Indicate which Class of PubOption is required.

  • Optional Element Summary

    Optional Elements
    Modifier and Type
    Optional Element
    Description
    Class<? extends PubSubCommand>[]
    affectedSubCommands
    Indicate which subcommand are affected with perquisites.
    PubPerquisitesOptions.PerquisitesPolicy
    policy
    Indicate the policy when applying annotated PubOption.

  • Element Details

    • perquisites

      Class<? extends PubOption>[] perquisites
      Indicate which Class of PubOption is required. And as a reference when removing PubOption which involved with annotated options.
      Returns:
      An array of PubOption Class which required to contain at least one or all PubOption assigned already.

    • affectedSubCommands

      Class<? extends PubSubCommand>[] affectedSubCommands
      Indicate which subcommand are affected with perquisites. By default, it contains empty array which all subcommands will be applied.
      Returns:
      An array of PubSubCommand that specify which subcommands can be affected.
      Default:
      {}

    • policy

      PubPerquisitesOptions.PerquisitesPolicy policy
      Indicate the policy when applying annotated PubOption.
      Returns:
      PubPerquisitesOptions.PerquisitesPolicy value. Default return PubPerquisitesOptions.PerquisitesPolicy.BOTH.
      Default:
      BOTH
